page.title: 15HOUSING, HASELOR,WARKS.
page.content: Here are a few brief notes on some of the houses in Haselor today, especially about those that have been altered. Little Manor used to be five houses with five families living in them. Not long ago it was built into one large house.You can still see the old beams. Four Gables and Yew Tree Cottage were two derelict,semi-detached cottages but then they were knocked down and rebuilt with new bricks and made into two houses .Mr.Tyrer built Four Gables and Mr.Farmer built Yew Tree Cottage. The old blacksmiths shop,across and up the road from the school, was taken down and a new house was built with the old bricks. Ivy Holme has been changed into a new house.You can see the markings in the bricks of a chimney breast,windows and a door,these have been bricked in.
